title: Coral Coast Beachfront Apartment Retreat with Sparkling Wine
description:
Located on the southern fringe of the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Great Barrier Reef, The Point Resort offers waterfront apartments on the Coral Coast, just steps from the white powdery sands of Bargara Beach. With a climate often compared to Hawaii, Bargara Beach is a family-friendly oasis of winding boardwalks, children's playgrounds, beachfront restaurants and laidback caf√©s, just 15 kilometres from Bundaberg.

Enjoy a self-contained apartment stay for two with a welcome bottle of sparkling wine and a guaranteed 12pm late checkout.

**Travelling with friends or family?** Upgrade to the Two Bedroom Ocean View Apartment for four people.

title: Laidback Tropical Coral Coast Apartment Stay Moments from the Beach
description:
Immerse yourself in the idyllic beachy lifestyle of Queensland's Coral Coast with a waterfront escape at The Point Resort. Located on the edge of The Esplanade, mere moments from local beaches, the resort offers views over the majestic Coral Sea and stylish, self-contained apartments with everything you need for a relaxing retreat from everyday life.

With its serene beachside setting and impeccable list of facilities, including an onsite pool, undercover secure parking, spa, six-hole mini-putt golf, BBQ amenities and Wi-Fi, The Point Resort is a tranquil oasis and the perfect launchpad to explore the unspoiled Northern Queensland coastline and Southern Great Barrier Reef.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Toast your escape with a welcome bottle of sparkling wine
- Relax until the last moment with a leisurely 11am checkout

**Travelling as a group?** Upgrade to a Two-Bedroom Ocean-View Apartment for up to four guests.
